title: Min Doktor söker full-stack utvecklare till Malmö
description:
**Vill du vara med på vår spännande resa och skapa framtidens vårdbolag och tjänster? Vi söker nu dig som är full-stack utvecklare och som vill utveckla och utvecklas tillsammans med oss!**

### **Om oss**


Min Doktor är Sveriges första digitala vårdgivare. Sedan starten 2013 har vi arbetat för att göra vården mer tillgänglig, jämlik och hållbar. Med hjälp av moderna digitala verktyg, hög medicinsk kvalitet och ett ständigt nytänkande bidrar vi till att utveckla vården i Sverige.


Utöver vår digitala tjänst driver idag vaccinationsmottagningar runt om i landet, vilket gör oss till en ledande aktör inom vaccination i Sverige.

**Att arbeta som full-stack utvecklare hos Min Doktor**


Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att vara del i en relativt liten och sammansvetsad produktorganisation, där arbetet är drivet av product discovery och insights. Ett nära samarbete mellan UX, produktägare och utvecklingsteamet är för oss viktigt precis som samarbetet i och mellan våra två utvecklingsteam. I denna roll finns det stora möjligheter för nytänkande, initiativtagande och personlig utveckling såväl som stora möjligheter att påverka produkten.


Att vara full-stack utvecklare på Min Doktor innebär att du kommer:

* + Vara del i ett team av engagerade utvecklare där vi tillsammans designar, bygger och driftsätter lösningar för framtidens digitala vård
	+ Dagligen utveckla och förbättra de appar som våra patienter respektive vårdgivare möter
	+ Designa robusta, tydliga API:er samt delta i övergripande arkitekturella diskussioner
	+ Underhålla och optimera vår deployment setup, med fokus på maintainability, skalbarhet, hög tillgänglighet samt säkerhet.
	+ Vara delaktig i diskussioner i strategin framåt för vår plattform och arkitektur
	+ Ta ett helhetsansvar och coacha juniora kollegor
	+ Få lov att ta tillvara på det du brinner för och få möjlighet att ge uttryck för det på bästa sätt.


Tjänsten utgår primärt från vårt kontor i Malmö och rapporterar till development team lead. Vi arbetar hybrid och vi vill gärna se dig på kontoret minst 2 dagar/vecka!

**Vem söker vi?**


Här är några saker som vi tror skulle göra att du skulle trivas och vara framgångsrik i rollen som frontend utvecklare på Min Doktor.

* + Du har dokumenterad erfarenhet av att jobba i team med BE. och FE utveckling, gärna i Golang och i cloud native miljö, i minst 5 år. Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta med systemdesign/arkitektur samt teknisk strategi är det ett stort plus.
	+ Du har erfarenhet av SQL databaser
	+ Du är framåttänkande och gillar att hålla dig uppdaterad på nya tekniker
	+ Du tycker om att dela med dig av erfarenheter och sprida kunskap till kollegor
	+ Du är självgående och tar gärna egna initiativ
	+ Du tycker om att engagera dig i planeringsarbete och way of working, och har gärna erfarenhet av det sen tidigare
	+ Du sätter en stolthet och förstår värdet i att skriva högkvalitativ mjukvara, samtidigt som du kan balansera detta mot inkommande krav och förstår vikten av att kontinuerligt släppa ut nya features till våra vårdgivare och patienter
	+ Du tycker om att ta egna initiativ och brinner för att vara med och forma vår tekniska plattform
	+ Du gillar att arbeta i team och tillsammans bollar ni fram den bästa lösningen givet situationen
	+ Du har erfarenhet och gillar att samarbeta med UX - där ni tillsammans jobbar iterativt för att hitta en bra balans mellan tekniska val och användarupplevelse.


Vår teknikstack består av:

* React / Typescript
* React Native / Typescript
* Next.js
* REST API
* Golang
* Postgres
* GCP/Docker/Kubernetes

##### **Välkommen med din ansökan**


Sista ansökningsdag är den 3 augusti.

title: Regular Scala Developer
description:
**About ICEO:**
---------------


We are a venture builder that has been creating innovative startups for the past twelve years. We’re on a mission to accelerate growth, enhance operational capabilities, and secure investments for our portfolio companies.


With a team of more than 150 people from 25 countries, we leverage repeatable company-building processes and best practices to derisk scaling and increase the probability of success. Our multiple exits so far stand as a testament to that.


Join us to build the future together!

**The project you will work on:**
---------------------------------

**BeOne** is a next-generation neobank that redefines how individuals and businesses manage money by blending traditional and digital finance. Our platform offers multi-currency accounts, ultra-low fees, real-time global payments, and robust financial tools, all within an intuitive, refined interface.


Our bold vision is to become the largest regulated funds and data transfer network for both retail and business customers. We empower users with financial freedom, security, and efficiency, whether for personal finances, business operations, or global investments.

  


**In this role, you will:**
---------------------------

* Develop software solutions ensuring code quality, maintainability, and performance by adhering to coding standards.
* Work on every stage of development - from gathering and analyzing requirements to implementation and testing - establishing strong relationships and trust based on consistent delivery.
* Interact directly with analytics teams and fellow developers to navigate through various levels of details.
* Review other developers' code.
* Contribute to technical documentation of provided solutions.

**What we expect from you:**
----------------------------

* Over 3 years of experience in backend development.
* Considerable expertise and proven track record of successfully designing and building web systems based on microservices architecture
* Extensive proficiency in Scala with a minimum of 2 years of practical experience
* Knowledge and familiarity with REST API principles and best practices
* Proven ability to analyze and solve technical problems
* Experience in enhancing application performance through optimization techniques
* Familiarity with multithreading concepts and distributed computing
* Full grasp of Git
* Self-motivated and accountable, capable of working independently with minimal supervision
* Great communication skills with both technical and non-technical people
* Proficient in both written and spoken English, at a B2 level or higher

**Why it’s worth a try - advantages of working at ICEO:**
---------------------------------------------------------

* **Salary PLN 18 000 - 25 000 net (approx. EUR 4,100 - 5,800) net Full-Time Independent Contractor Agreement**
* As part of your B2B contract, you can use up to 38 + 14 days/year of paid interruption in the provision of your services,
* Equipment - you will receive a MacBook/Windows equivalent and all the high-quality accessories and tools you need,
* Full-time employment,
* The possibility of adjusting working hours,
* Work in remote mode or from one of our offices,
* Access to training platforms,
* Work in an atmosphere of innovation, in a multidisciplinary team of professionals,
* Participation in business and integration meetings.

**Our recruitment process includes these stages:**
--------------------------------------------------

**1. CV review:**  

We are going to review your application and get back to you with feedback within **7** **days**.

**2. Screening with TA Partner** (about 45 minutes):  

We will tell you about us, our projects, and the next steps in the recruitment process. Additionally, we’ll ask you questions connected with your experience to confirm our mutual alignment with the position.

**3. Technical interview with our 2 Scala Developers** (about 1,5h):


Our Scala Developers will ask you technical questions connected to your experience and the technologies that we use. It will be an opportunity to you to get to know your potential colleagues and gather information about their daily work and the challenges they face.

**4. Home assignment task (optional):**


After the technical interview, our Scala Developers will decide if the optional stage is needed. If they decide to give you the task, you can expect to take a home assignment to assess your proficiency in Scala and Zio stack.

**5. Final interview with** **Head of Technology** (1-1,5h):


We would like to ask you a few technical and soft-skills questions. It will be an opportunity to get to know your potential manager.  

If you solved the home assignment, there will be a discussion about that.

**Want to know more?**
----------------------

* Take a look at our profile on Clutch and find out what our clients say about us.
* Visit our website and check who we have helped to succeed.

*ICEO is an equal employer. We respect and empower each individual who joins us. We commit to a transparent, inclusive and non-discriminatory recruitment process and employment.*

title: Vi söker Fullstack-, Backend- och Frontendutvecklare!
description:
*Hos Futur har vi valt en annorlunda väg. Istället för att luta oss mot branschens standardsystem bygger vi vår egen tekniska plattform. Det är en modern och anpassningsbar lösning som gör det möjligt att agera snabbare, skala smartare och möta våra kunders behov. Det är ett strategiskt val som ger utveckling en nyckelroll i hela affären.*

*Nu söker vi fler utvecklare, frontend-, backend- och fullstackinriktade som vill vara med och forma hur vi bygger vidare. Hos oss får du påverka, arbeta nära teknik och affär samt vara en del av ett team som har både höga ambitioner och ett starkt samarbete.*

**Din roll**


Vi matchar dig med det team och ansvar som bäst passar din profil, oavsett om du vill fokusera på backend i .NET, frontend i Angular, eller arbeta fullstack. Du blir en del av ett team som äger både utveckling och drift av sina komponenter, med stora möjligheter att påverka tekniska beslut. Arbetet är affärsnära, men alltid med teknisk höjd. Särskilt nu när vi transformerar vår plattform från on-prem till Azure-miljö med containerbaserad infrastruktur.


Hos oss får du en bred roll med frihet att växa. Vi tror att du gillar moderna arbetssätt, stabil kod, testdriven utveckling och att arbeta nära produkt och andra utvecklare. Du kommer in i en miljö med låg personalomsättning, erfarna kollegor, och en kultur där hjälpsamhet, prestigelöshet och utvecklingsvilja går hand i hand.


**Teknikmiljö**


* **Backend:** C#/.NET (senaste LTS), Reactive Extensions, LanguageExt
* **Frontend:** Angular, Typescript
* **Cloud &** **Infrastruktur****:** Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, IaC med Bicep
* **DevOps &** **Säkerhet:** Azure DevOps, CI/CD, loggning, API Management, Identity Provider, Zero Trust
* Vi arbetar agilt med scrum

**Vem** **vi söker**

Vi letar efter dig som har flera års erfarenhet som utvecklare. Du är trygg i din stack, nyfiken på molnteknik, gillar att jobba testdrivet och vill bidra både tekniskt och kollegialt. Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Azure, containerisering och DevOps, men viktigast är viljan att vara med och bygga något långsiktigt tillsammans.


**Vi erbjuder:**

* Vi är ett stabilt och tryggt bolag med stark tillväxt och låg personalomsättning.
* Generöst friskvårdsbidrag
* En bra tjänstepension & förmånligt sparande
* Lunchförmåner


Vi gillar att ses på plats och är på kontoret **majoriteten** av tiden, du får självklart en egen arbetsplats och vi sitter i fräscha lokaler centralt på Östermalm.


**Låter** **det** **intressant?**


Vi jobbar med löpande urval och kommer att påbörja intervjuer i augusti efter en välförtjänt semester. Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl men har du frågor så är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Johanna Eriksson på johanna.eriksson@ants.se

title: Software and System Developer
description:
About ArinaSoft AB
  
ArinaSoft AB is a forward-thinking technology company at the forefront of automotive innovation. We specialize in delivering high-performance software systems, embedded solutions, and AI-powered safety technologies to leading automotive OEMs and Tier-1 suppliers. Through our commitment to quality, safety, and technological advancement, we are driving the future of mobility toward smarter, safer, and more sustainable roads.
  
At ArinaSoft, we foster a collaborative and knowledge-sharing environment where curiosity is encouraged, expertise is valued, and impact is real.
  
Position Summary
  
We are seeking a skilled and driven Software and System Developer with 3–5 years of hands-on experience in embedded software engineering. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on next-generation vehicle systems, from control algorithms and model-based design to system-level integration and validation. You’ll be part of a dynamic, cross-functional team delivering high-quality solutions that shape the automotive technologies of tomorrow.
  
Responsibilities
  
Develop and optimize embedded automotive software.
  
Design and implement control logic using MATLAB/Simulink, including Model-in-the-Loop (MIL) and Software-in-the-Loop (SIL) testing.
  
  

Build and maintain unit tests with GTest or similar frameworks.
  
  

Contribute to CI/CD pipelines using tools such as Jenkins, Docker, Gerrit, and Zuul.
  
  

Conduct Hardware-in-the-Loop (HIL) testing and support real-vehicle validation.
  
  

Ensure adherence to functional safety and software standards including ISO 26262, and ASPICE.
  
  

Collaborate with multidisciplinary teams including hardware, system, and validation engineers.
  
  

Maintain clear and comprehensive technical documentation.
  
  

Mentor junior team members and contribute to continuous improvement efforts.
  
  

Required Qualifications
  
3–5 years of experience in embedded or automotive software development.
  
  

Practical knowledge of MATLAB/Simulink and model-based system design.
  
  

Familiarity with unit testing, CI/CD methodologies, and version control (e.g., Git/Gerrit).
  
  

Understanding of automotive software safety standards and quality processes.
  
  

Excellent problem-solving, communication, and teamwork abilities.
  
  

Fluency in English (written and spoken).
  
  

Preferred Qualifications
  
Exposure to ADAS, AI/ML, or vision-based systems.
  
  

Experience with automotive communication protocols (CAN/CANopen).
  
  

Background in Agile/Scrum development methodologies.
  
  

Degree in Computer Science, Electrical/Software Engineering, or a related field.
  
  

What We Offer
  
At ArinaSoft, we believe great talent deserves great support. We provide:
  
Comprehensive private health insurance
  
  

Generous parental leave policies
  
  

Ongoing professional development through in-house and external training programs
  
  

Paid sick leave and 25 vacation days plus public holidays
  
  

Flexible working hours and a focus on work-life balance
  
  

A pension scheme and employee referral program
  
  

A vibrant, innovation-driven work culture with real impact on safety and sustainability
  
  

How to Apply
  
If you're ready to build the future of mobility and are passionate about cutting-edge technology and real-world impact, we’d love to hear from you.
  
ArinaSoft – Engineering Innovation for Safer Roads.
  
Note to Applicants
  
Thank you for your interest in joining ArinaSoft. Every application will be carefully reviewed against the role’s requirements. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. If you do not hear from us within 10 working days, we kindly inform you that your profile was not selected at this time. However, your information will be retained for future relevant opportunities.

title: Software and System Developer
description:
Autonomous Vision is a leading technology company specializing in innovative software solutions for the automotive industry. We collaborate closely with top automotive manufacturers and suppliers to deliver cutting-edge embedded systems, control algorithms, and AI-driven safety applications. With a strong focus on quality, innovation, and sustainable development, Autonomous Vision is driving the future of automotive technology. Join us and be part of a team committed to excellence and making roads safer worldwide.
  
  

**Position Overview:**  

We are looking for a talented and motivated Software and System Developer with 3 to 5 years of experience to join our Göteborg office. You will work on embedded automotive software development, including C/C++ programming, system design, and validation in model-based environments. Your role will involve close collaboration with cross-functional teams and participation throughout the software development lifecycle.
  
Key Responsibilities
  
Develop and maintain embedded automotive software using C++ and Python.
  
Design control algorithms with MATLAB/Simulink; validate using MIL/SIL.
  
Create unit tests (Gtest) and ensure CI/CD integration (Jenkins, Docker, Zuul).
  
Work in Linux-based environments; manage code via Git/Gerrit.
  
Conduct HIL and real vehicle testing.
  
Ensure compliance with ISO 26262, MISRA C++, and ASPICE.
  
Collaborate across teams and maintain technical documentation.
  
Share knowledge and support junior developers.
  
  

Required Qualifications
  
3–5 years of experience in embedded/automotive software development.
  
Strong skills in C++, Python, and Linux environments.
  
Experience with MATLAB/Simulink and model-based design.
  
Familiar with CI/CD workflows and testing frameworks (e.g., Gtest).
  
Knowledge of ISO 26262, MISRA C++, and ASPICE standards.
  
Proficient in English; strong analytical and teamwork skills.
  
  

Preferred Qualifications
  
Experience with ADAS, AI/ML, or Android/Yocto development.
  
Knowledge of CAN/CANopen protocols.
  
Background in Agile/Scrum environments.
  
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a relevant technical field.
  
  

In return for bringing your expertise to our business we offer a competitive salary along with excellent benefits including:
  
Private Health Insurance
  
Parental Leave
  
Continued Training (through our internal portal and external resources)
  
Sick Leave
  
Flexible Working Hours (Flex Time)
  
Pension Scheme
  
Employee Referral Scheme
  
25 Days of Holiday plus Bank Holidays
  
  

If you are passionate about bringing innovation to the projects you work on then we would love to hear from you.
  
**Autonomous Vision:** Shaping the Future of Safer Mobility.
  
We sincerely thank all applicants for their interest in joining Autonomous Vision. Every application will be carefully reviewed based on the role’s criteria. Please note that only candidates selected for further consideration will be contacted. If you do not hear from us within 10 business days of your application, it means you have not been selected at this time. However, we will keep your profile on file for any suitable future opportunities.
  
Öppen för alla
  
Vi fokuserar på din kompetens, inte dina övriga förutsättningar. Vi är öppna för att anpassa rollen eller arbetsplatsen efter dina behov.

title: Azure Developer
description:
Join Dustin’s integration team and take charge of driving innovation as you work with cutting-edge Azure technologies to shape the future of our cloud solutions. If you're well experienced in the field, passionate about Azure, integrations, and making an impact through technology, this is the opportunity for you.

**This is what makes the position as Azure Developer unique**

* Drive innovation with the latest Azure technologies in a key role shaping Dustin’s cloud-first transformation.


* Take the lead and inspire others by coaching and sharing your expertise within integrations and modern cloud architecture.


* Unleash your creativity in a tech-driven team where your ideas and initiatives truly make an impact.

  


The hiring manager for the role is **Sara Wennerström, Director of Application Management.** She believes that successful work is built on initiative, engagement, and a solid understanding of business processes and system support. As a leader, she is open, attentive, and committed to setting goals together with the team to achieve collective success.

  

The integration development team is close-knit, where members consistently support one another, balancing focused work time from home with two fixed office days each week, dedicated to collaboration and enjoying early lunches together.  

  

***Read more about Dustin here***

 **Your role & influence as Azure Developer**

*Responsibility*: You will be given responsibility for integration development in Azure, including designing solution architectures for new requirements and driving process improvements as an informal leader within the team.  

  

*Collaboration*: Together with your team, you take care of integration development between standard applications, build APIs for external customers, and continuously maintain and improve the team’s solutions. You'll work closely not only with your immediate team members but also with other developers across Technology and a wide range of internal and external stakeholders around Dustin.  

  

*Core activities:*

* Develop and implement integration solutions using Azure technologies like Logic Apps, Azure Functions, and Service Bus.


* Design solution architectures for new integration requirements and recommend the best technical approaches.


* Collaborate with the team to maintain and improve existing BizTalk solutions, while coaching and sharing knowledge with colleagues in the Azure and integration space.

  

**Benefits of joining Dustin**


We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us.  

  



**You can find more on our benefits below in the vacancy.**

**This is what we imagine you bring**


We envision you as a curious and driven individual passionate about cutting-edge technology, eager to lead and mentor, and skilled at driving innovative solutions. We expect that you bring solid senior experience in Azure Functions, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and Cosmos DB, with a strong background in leading teams, implementing new processes, and solution architecture.

 *Additionally, it'll be nice if you bring:*

  

* A bachelor's degree level of working and thinking
* Experience with APIM, Biztalk
* Proficiency in Swedish.

**What can you expect next?**


To ensure a fair recruitment process free from unconscious bias, we handle your application anonymously and do not accept cover letters. Please refrain from sending one, so that the selection is based solely on professional competencies. We expect the following steps in the recruitment process:

* Telephone screening with Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma Sindhu.
* First interview with the Hiring Manager, Sara Wennerström.
* Technical (Second) interview with two future colleagues from the team.
* Professional References.

***Please note that for this specific job, we don´t provide any relocation or work permit sponsorship support.***

**Read more about how to become a** **Dustineer**


For questions about the position, please contact the Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma Sindhu via e-mail: karishma.sindhu@dustin.com**.**
company_description: We are a leading online-based IT partner in the Nordics and the Benelux. We are in constant movement and with that comes many opportunities for us to develop and grow together. Are you ready to join?

title: Fullstack-utvecklare till Ictech Göteborg!
description:
### **Vill du vara en del av ett konsultbolag där du står i centrum? Ictech erbjuder en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där innovation, kvalitet och långsiktighet präglar varje uppdrag. Vi söker nu erfarna individer som vill ta nästa steg i karriären och utvecklas tillsammans med oss.**

##### **Om oss :**


Ictech är ett etablerat och växande konsultbolag med spetskompetens inom system- och mjukvaruutveckling. Sedan vår start 2011 har vi byggt upp en stark organisation där vi kombinerar teknisk expertis med en genuin gemenskap. Vårt team består av engagerade och kunniga konsulter som brinner för att leverera lösningar av högsta kvalitet. Som konsult hos oss blir du en del av en kultur präglad av nytänkande, transparens och samarbete.


Vi tror på individanpassade uppdrag där din kompetens och ambition styr din utveckling. Genom att matcha rätt person med rätt projekt skapar vi de bästa förutsättningarna för både våra kunder och våra konsulter. På Ictech är du vår viktigaste tillgång – och vi satsar på din framgång.

##### **Om rollen:**


Som fullstackutvecklare hos oss får du arbeta med utmanande och innovativa projekt i hela teknikstacken. Du kommer att samarbeta med både kunder och kollegor för att utveckla och optimera digitala lösningar med de senaste teknologierna. Hos oss får du möjlighet att bland annat arbeta med:

* **Backend**: Java, .NET, C#, Spring Boot, Rust, C++, GO, Python
* **Frontend**: Angular, React, React Native, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS
* **Molntjänster & DevOps**: Azure, AWS, CI/CD, DevOps


Vi söker dig som har ett starkt driv, en passion för teknik och en vilja att kontinuerligt utvecklas och leverera högkvalitativa lösningar. Du är nyfiken, resultatinriktad och strävar alltid efter att förbättra ditt arbete och skapa värde för både kunder och kollegor. Din erfarenhet har du fått genom en relevant utbildning samt minimum 5 års arbetslivserfarenhet.

##### **Vad vi erbjuder:**


Hos Ictech är din utveckling och trivsel avgörande. Vi erbjuder:

* Möjligheten att arbeta med tekniskt avancerade och spännande projekt.
* En kultur som uppmuntrar innovation, samarbete och teknisk excellens.
* Stöd för din karriärutveckling genom kompetensutveckling och utbildningar.
* Flexibla arbetsvillkor och en arbetsmiljö som främjar balans mellan arbete och fritid.
* En stark gemenskap där vi värdesätter engagemang, samhörighet och personlig utveckling.

##### **Ansökan:**


Är du redo för en ny utmaning? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag och bli en del av vårt team! Vid frågor, kontakta andreas.lindblom@ictech.se.


Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Systemutvecklare till konsultteamet i Karlstad!
description:
#### **Ictech letar efter engagerade och nyfikna utvecklare som vill vara med och stärka vårt växande team av konsulter i Karlstad. Nu söker vi dig som brinner för systemutveckling och vill arbeta med komplexa tekniska lösningar i spännande projekt!**


Enligt våra konsulter är Ictech Sveriges bästa konsultbolag. Vi har en ambition om att vara den bästa leverantören i hela utvecklingsprocessen, i alla lägen. En ledande aktör inom teknologi och innovation helt enkelt! Ictech grundades i Göteborg år 2011 och har sedan dess vuxit och expanderat till nya städer under de senaste åren. Vi öppnade upp vårt Karlstadkontor under hösten 2023.

#### **Vi tror att du:**

* Har några års erfarenhet som systemutvecklare eller systemingenjör
* Har goda kunskaper i programmering
* Trivs i en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö
* Gillar att analysera, designa och utveckla robusta systemlösningar

#### **På Ictech värderar vi kreativitet, innovation och teknisk kompetens, men också personlig utveckling och en sund arbetsbalans. Som konsult hos oss får du chansen att:**

* Utveckla din tekniska kompetens genom att arbeta med olika kunder och projekt i flera branscher
* Påverka systemlösningar och bidra med din expertis för att hjälpa våra kunder att nå sina mål
* Fortsätta utvecklas genom utbildningar och kompetensutveckling
* Bli en del av vår unika företagskultur där vi värnar om varandra och har kul på jobbet
* Själv sätta ramarna för ditt arbete – vi erbjuder stor flexibilitet och generösa arbetsvillkor

#### **Ansökan**


Låter det här som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!


Vid frågor, kontakta niclas.kark@ictech.se

title: Embedded developer sökes till Ictech i Göteborg!
description:
**Drömmer du i C++? Då vill vi gärna höra från dig.**
-----------------------------------------------------


Vill du ta nästa steg i din karriär – på en arbetsplats där du får vara med och forma framtidens tekniklösningar?


Ictech i Göteborg söker dig som har ett intresse för C++, både i arbetet och kanske även som hobby. Hos oss får du jobba i ett sammansvetsat team där vi lär av varandra, utvecklas tillsammans och samtidigt har kul på vägen.

#### **Varför Ictech och inte ett av alla andra konsultbolag?**


Vi erbjuder frihet, balans och långsiktighet. Hos oss kan du själv påverka din lön och din arbetssituation genom flexibla modeller. Vill du hellre ha stabilitet? Då har vi även en trygg, traditionell modell. På vårt kontor på Lindholmen möts du av ett öppet och välkomnande klimat där vi bryr oss om varandra och ofta hittar på roliga saker tillsammans – allt från nördkvällar till AWs.

### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet inom mjukvaruutveckling och inbyggda system
* Har en högre utbildning, exempelvis en kandidat- eller masterexamen
* Är nyfiken, engagerad och vill fortsätta utvecklas inom programmering
* Har goda kunskaper i embedded C++ (gärna även C och Python)
* Har erfarenhet av Linux-miljö
* Vill arbeta med teknik i framkant – i en miljö där din kompetens tas tillvara

### **Hos oss på Ictech får du:**

* Arbeta i meningsfulla och spännande teknikprojekt
* Samarbeta med kunniga och hjälpsamma kollegor
* Påverka din egen utveckling genom utbildningar och stöd
* Flexibla arbetsvillkor och ett familjevänligt synsätt

title: C/C++ Developer till Ictech Västerås!
description:
#### **Är du en mjukvaruutvecklare med intresse för innovation, utveckling och allting embedded?**


Ictech är ett unikt konsultbolag specialiserade på system- och mjukvaruutveckling. Vår strävan är att vara den bästa leverantören i hela utvecklingsprocessen, i alla lägen. Vi letar just nu efter drivna och kunniga systemutvecklare till vårt Västeråskontor som vill vara med och ta utvecklingen av Ictech till nästa nivå.

#### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet som mjukvaruutvecklare, mjukvaruingenjör eller motsvarande
* Har kompetens inom flera språk men C/C++ som huvudspråk (python är exempelvis ett plus!)
* Gillar att lösa problem
* Trivs i en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö
* Har en vilja att bidra och ta saker från start till mål
* Talar flytande svenska och engelska

#### **Varför ska du välja Ictech?**


För att det är givande att vara konsult hos oss! Som konsult på Ictech har man friheten att själv sätta ramarna för sitt arbete. Vi erbjuder en konkurrenskraftig lönestruktur och generösa förmåner. Du kommer att få jobba med rolig teknik och utmanande projekt, med en stor möjlighet till utveckling. Ictech präglas av ett öppet arbetsklimat där vi bryr oss om varandra och har kul på jobbet!


Det kanske låter som en klyscha, men vi menar varje ord!


#### **Flexibilitet och frihet**


För oss är rätt person på rätt uppdrag avgörande. Vi lägger därför mycket tid på att hitta och matcha det som passar individen bäst. Vi värdesätter det personliga och har därför max 15 konsulter per chef för att säkerställa att varje individ får den tid och uppmärksamhet de behöver.


Hos oss får du stor frihet att styra över både arbetstid och löneuttag. Vår flexibla lönemodell gör det möjligt för dig att anpassa din inkomst efter dina behov – du kan använda dina intjänade pengar till arbetsrelaterade inköp och välja när och hur du tar ut lön. Detta ger dig en unik möjlighet att få större kontroll över din arbetsvardag. Föredrar du en traditionell fastlön? Det är också ett alternativ. Oavsett vilket upplägg du väljer, erbjuder vi en arbetsplats där du kan utvecklas, bestämma själv och ha kul samtidigt!


#### **Ansökan**


Låter det här som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag och bli en del av vårt härliga, växande gäng i Västerås! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig. Vid frågor, kontakta martin.eriksson@ictech.se

title: Embedded-utvecklare med driv? Sätt din prägel på Ictechs...
description:
**Ictech intar Stockholm!**


Vi öppnar nu vårt nya kontor i Stockholm! Med lång erfarenhet i branschen och ett starkt nätverk i regionen bygger vi en stabil grund för fortsatt framgång. Ictech, grundat 2011 i Göteborg, är ett växande konsultbolag med 160 anställda över 5 olika orter, specialiserade på system- och mjukvaruutveckling. Nu söker vi dig som vill vara med och bygga vårt nya kontor från grunden!

**Vi söker dig som:**


Har några års erfarenhet som mjukvaruutvecklare och relevant utbildning  

* 

Behärskar flera programmeringsspråk, med C/C++ som ditt huvudspråk (kunskap i Python är meriterande).  
* 

Är en problemlösare och gillar att ta dig an nya utmaningar.  
* 

Trivs i en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö.  
* 
* Är drivande och vill ta ansvar för projekt från start till mål.
  

**Som anställd på Ictech får du:**

  

Som anställd på Ictech får du möjlighet att utvecklas både tekniskt och professionellt genom uppdrag hos olika kunder inom flera branscher – ofta med stor flexibilitet. Vi tror på att våra konsulter gör störst nytta när de får använda sin expertis i uppdrag som verkligen passar dem, och vi ser till att du har inflytande över vilka uppdrag du tar dig an.


Vi erbjuder kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling genom utbildningar och nya tekniska utmaningar, samtidigt som du är en del av en stark företagskultur där gemenskap, omtanke och arbetsglädje står i centrum.


Hos oss har du också stor frihet att påverka din arbetssituation. Vi erbjuder konkurrenskraftig lön och riktigt generösa förmåner – och du kan själv välja mellan en flexibel eller traditionell lönemodell, beroende på vad som passar dig bäst.

  


**Ansökan**  

Låter det här som något för dig? Skicka din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig. Vid frågor, kontakta mig, Niclas, på niclas.kark@ictech.se

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom inbäddade system till växande...
description:
**Kära kodentusiaster!**
------------------------


Vi är på jakt efter engagerade utvecklare för att expandera vårt växande team av konsulter i Karlstad. Nu söker vi dig som har erfarenhet av C eller C++ och har arbetat med inbyggda system.


Enligt våra konsulter är Ictech Sveriges bästa konsultbolag. Vi har en ambition om att vara den bästa leverantören i hela utvecklingsprocessen, i alla lägen. En ledande aktör inom teknologi och innovation helt enkelt. Ictech grundades i Göteborg år 2011 och har sedan dess vuxit och expanderat till nya städer under de senaste åren. Vi öppnade upp vårt Karlstadkontor under hösten 2023.


#### **Vi tror att du är någon som:**

* Har några år på nacken som mjukvaruutvecklare
* Har kompetens inom flera språk men C/C++ som huvudspråk (python är exempelvis ett plus!)
* Gillar att lösa problem
* Trivs i en dynamisk och flexibel arbetsmiljö
* Har en vilja att bidra och ta saker från start till mål

#### **På Ictech värderar vi kreativitet, innovation och teknisk kompetens, men också personlig utveckling och en sund arbetsbalans. Som konsult hos oss får du chansen att:**

* Utveckla din tekniska kompetens genom att arbeta med olika kunder och projekt, i olika branscher (både on-site och hybrid).
* Bidra med din kunskap för att hjälpa våra kunder att nå sina mål.
* Fortsätta att utvecklas genom utbildningar och kompetensutveckling.
* Bli en del av vår unika företagskultur där vi värnar om varandra och har kul på jobbet.
* Själv sätta ramarna för ditt arbete. Här erbjuds en hög grad av flexibilitet, med generösa arbetsvillkor.

#### **Ansökan**


Låter det här som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig. Vid frågor, kontakta niclas.kark@ictech.se

title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom inbyggda system till attraktivt...
description:
**Ictech är ett medelstort konsultföretag inom mjukvaruutveckling med en passion för teknologi och innovation. Ictech grundades i Göteborg år 2011 och har sedan dess vuxit och expanderat till nya städer under de senaste åren. Vi öppnade upp vårt Jönköpingskontor under hösten 2023, och nu är vi på jakt efter engagerade utvecklare för att expandera vårt växande team av konsulter.**

**Är du en dedikerad embeddedutvecklare med en passion för C++, Qt/QML, Linux eller Zephyr? Då kan du vara den vi letar efter!**

##### **Du får gärna:**

* Ha minst tre års arbetslivserfarenhet av utveckling inom inbäddade system.
* Ha erfarenhet av agila utvecklingsmetoder och verktyg som Git, Docker och CI/CD.
* Ha kunskap om realtidsoperativsystem och systemintegration eller enhetsintegration.
* Vara bekväm i Linux och Zephyr, eller gillar att arbeta med C++ och QT/QML för applikationsutveckling.

##### **Varför ska du välja Ictech?**


För att det är roligt att vara konsult hos oss! Som konsult på Ictech har man friheten att själv sätta ramarna för sitt arbete. Man blir erbjuden en hög grad flexibilitet och vi ser till att varje uppdrag känns helt rätt för dig. Vi erbjuder en konkurrenskraftig lönestruktur och våra förmåner är riktigt generösa. Du kommer att få jobba med rolig teknik och utmanande projekt, med en stor möjlighet till utveckling. Våra uppdrag utförs dels på plats hos våra kunder, men även inhouse i våra lokaler på Werket. Ictech präglas av ett öppet arbetsklimat där vi bryr oss om varandra och har kul på jobbet!


Som konsult hos oss har du möjlighet att välja en flexibel lönemodell som innebär att du själv får bestämma hur fördelningen av dina intäkter och kostnader ser ut. Detta är ett perfekt alternativ för dig som vill ha större kontroll över din arbetssituation. Men självklart kan man välja en traditionell lönemodell också.


##### **Ansökan:**


Låter det här som något för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag! Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig. Vid frågor, kontakta mig, Fredrik Hjort, VD på Ictech Jönköping, via fredrik.hjort@ictech.se

title: Graduate Software Engineer
description:
At Bending Spoons, we’re striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.
   

  

 To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform—which comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor’s attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.
   

  

 For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That’s our promise to such a candidate.
   

  

**A few examples of your responsibilities** 
* **Master your toolkit.** 
 By working across diverse tech stacks, you’ll refine your ability to choose the right tools for every challenge. From monolithic to microservices architectures, gRPC to REST APIs, Kubernetes to Docker, Python to Rust—you’ll show that true expertise isn’t about using the trendiest technologies, but about understanding their purpose to unleash their full potential.
* **Build stuff that matters.** 
 Regardless of your seniority, you’ll enjoy plenty of autonomy and take full ownership of your work, from ideation to execution. You’ll have the unique opportunity to build software from the ground up and witness firsthand how your code evolves into a product used at scale.
* **Simplify relentlessly.** 
 Is every component essential? Do we need this process? As a Bending Spoons engineer, your mission is to turn complexity into simplicity. Whether optimizing CI/CD pipelines, writing maintainable code, or crafting minimalist architectures, your drive to simplify will power scalable, future-proof solutions.


**What we look for** 
* **Reasoning ability.** 
 Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
* **Drive.** 
 You’re extremely ambitious in everything you do—and your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high—and rising—bar.
* **Team spirit.** 
 You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You’re reliable, honest, and transparent.
* **Proficiency in English.** 
 You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.


**What we offer** 
* **Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams.** 
 You’ll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
* **An exceptional opportunity for growth.** 
 We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential—then, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you’ve got what it takes, you’ll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
* **Competitive pay and access to equity in the company.** 
 Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of £66,779 in the UK and €63,965 elsewhere. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between £110,389 and £149,636 in the UK, and €105,737 and €143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
* **All. These. Benefits.** 
 Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


**Commitment & contract**
 Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.
   

  

**Location**
 Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.
   

  

**Before you apply**
 Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We're extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don't hesitate to apply.
   

  

**The selection process**
 If you pass our screening, we’ll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you’re successful with those, we’ll invite you to a series of interviews.
   

  

 Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested through this form.
   

  

 Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn’t a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

title: Senior Software Engineer (.Net)
description:
**Job Description**
**WHAT YOU’LL DO**
 As a
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
 , you will provide technical leadership and strategic direction to your development team. Your role involves overseeing the entire software development lifecycle, from conceptualization and design to development, testing, and maintenance. You will lead the design of complex systems and applications, including 3D/2D render pipelines, while guiding and mentoring other engineers. Your broad and deep understanding of various technologies will ensure the delivery of high-quality software that meets user and stakeholder expectations.
   

  

**In addition to the above, your role will involve:** 
  

  

* Software Development & Optimization: Design, develop, and optimize high-quality, secure, scalable, and reliable software that meets business and customer needs.
* Technical Leadership & Mentorship: Provide technical leadership and direction to teams, mentoring engineers to foster a collaborative environment and achieve business goals.
* Stakeholder Collaboration & Problem Solving: Engage with stakeholders to understand complex requirements and propose innovative solutions to enhance system architecture and performance.
* Project Scoping & Risk Management: Lead work estimates and forecasts, identifying risks, challenges, and opportunities with technical expertise.
* Standards & Code Reviews: Adhere to and improve architecture, design, implementation, and security standards, conduct code reviews and promoting collaborative programming.
* System Integration & Testing: Analyse integration needs, design complex system integrations, and implement unit and integration tests to ensure software quality.
* Reusable Components & Documentation: Develop and maintain reusable software components and frameworks, defining and maintaining standards for technical documentation.
* Communication & Continuous Improvement: Convey complex technical concepts to stakeholders and continuously enhance development practices and processes for better efficiency and quality.


**Who You’ll Work With**
 As a Senior Software Engineer, you’ll collaborate closely with a cross-functional team that includes the Product Manager, Solution Architect, fellow developers, and application experts. You won’t just contribute code—you’ll help shape the technical direction, mentor team members, and drive the delivery of high-quality solutions. Your leadership will play a key role in turning ideas into scalable, maintainable, and impactful software.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 We are looking for people with...
   

  

* Experience: Minimum 5+ years of hands-on experience in application development and system integration. NET Core, Microservices, and APIs are must have with strong hands-on skills.
* Azure Cloud Services: Strong hands-on experience with Azure Functions, Azure Logic Apps, Azure Service Bus, Azure App Service, Azure App Insights, Blob Storage, Azure Monitoring, and Azure Cosmos DB.
* CI/CD Pipelines: Experience in creating and working with CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using Bicep, Terraform, etc.
* Messaging Frameworks and Event Brokers: Exposure to Solace PubSub, Kafka, etc.
* Integration Projects: Experience in building cloud-native integrations.
* Application and Cloud Security: Good knowledge of best practices.
* Artifact Preparation: Ability to prepare well-designed artifacts.
* Technical Improvements: Ability to suggest technical improvements.


 And people who are…
   

  

* Problem-Solver: Exceptional at identifying and resolving issues with a keen eye for detail.
* Collaborator: Highly collaborative and proactive in seeking clarification and asking questions.
* Effective Communicator: Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Self-Driven: Motivated and capable of working independently.
* Responsible: Takes ownership of tasks, works proactively, and continuously seeks improvement.


**Who We Are**
 H&M Group is a global company of strong fashion brands and ventures. Our goal is to prove that there is no compromise between exceptional design, affordable prices, and sustainable solutions. We want to liberate fashion for the many, and our customers are at the heart of every decision we make.
   

  

 We are made up of thousands of passionate and talented colleagues united by our shared culture and values. Together, we want to use our power, our scale, and our knowledge to push the fashion industry towards a more inclusive and sustainable future.
   

  

**WHY YOU’LL LOVE WORKING HERE** 
  

  

 At H&M Group, we are proud to be a vibrant and welcoming company. We offer our employees attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe.
   

  

* Staff discount card: Usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online.
* H&M Incentive Program (HIP): Included in our HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
* Competitive pensions: Collective Agreement and ITP pensions competitive to the Swedish market.
* Generous vacation: 30 days' vacation, health care allowance, and good work-life balance.
* Additional perks: Discounts from Benify.
* Innovative Environment: Work with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.
* Global Impact: Be part of a team that influences users worldwide.
* Professional Growth: Endless opportunities to learn and develop your skills.
* Collaborative Culture: Join a motivated team that values collaboration and excellence.


**JOIN US**
 Our uniqueness comes from a combination of many things – our inclusive and collaborative culture, our strong values, and opportunities for growth. But most of all, it’s our people who make us who we are.
   

  

**Take the next step in your career together with us. The journey starts here.**

title: Lead Developer
description:
**Looking for a workplace for the future?** 




 At Telenor, you own your career. Here, you’ll have the opportunity to make the most of your dreams and expertise while contributing to technological innovations that are barely even imagined today. Innovations that we know will change the map for how we communicate and live our connected lives in the future. Are you looking for a workplace where you can make a difference in what matters most – relationships between people.
 



  





 We are looking for a forward-thinking and innovative person to join one of our dynamic development teams. Telenor is rapidly adapting to the digital future, and we are looking for people with a natural proactive drive who want to make a difference.
 



  





**What you will do** 




 As a Lead Developer, you will help shape the technical vision and ensure the quality of software within your team, working primarily with AWS and Java SpringBoot microservices. You will lead the design of robust, scalable, and secure solutions, while mentoring team members in best practices for coding, design, and performance optimization.
 



  





 You will collaborate with stakeholders, architects, and team leaders to support project and development planning. Your role will also involve at least 50% hands-on coding, conducting code reviews, and continuously improving development processes, focusing on maintaining the product’s technical health. You'll also be accountable for enhancing developer experience and helping the team balance short- and long-term goals, ensuring delivery of key objectives and adhering to technical guidelines.
 



  





 In addition, you will be part of the
 **Lead Developer chapter** 
 , where you will:
 


* Actively drive and participate in improvement projects and ways of working.
* Contribute to coding standards and design patterns.
* Proactively share knowledge and insights across teams.
* Actively work to improve the overall developer experience.
* Assist management in tactical and strategic work.
* Host technical interviews to help grow the team with top talent.



  





**Who you are** 




 You are an experienced software developer with a deep understanding of custom-built applications and strong expertise in AWS, Java SpringBoot microservices, and system design patterns (scalability, resilience, security). You have a strategic mindset when it comes to software architecture and are proficient in DevOps practices like CI/CD. You're analytical, a problem solver, and comfortable managing complex projects, leading teams, and communicating effectively.
 



  





 Self-leadership, time management, and a proactive approach are key attributes of your working style. You lead by example, continuously learn, and are passionate about improving technical excellence within your team. You don’t feel the need to be the most senior developer in the team but are comfortable working with and delegating to more senior technical experts, while contributing code alongside them.
 



  





**Our promise to you** 




*We are better together.* 




 Here, you’ll be part of a family-like and inclusive culture, built on strong shared values and leadership that empowers you with both trust and confidence. We believe in enabling each other to act and make decisions, while always having each other’s backs through ups and downs.
 



  





*We support relationships and societies.* 




  





 Telenor plays a vital role in the society, giving your work a greater purpose. Every day, we create value for millions of people and maintain a customer-first approach where human relationships are at the heart of everything we do.
 



  





*We make room for life.* 




  





 Work from home up to two days a week, where your role allows it. The rest of the time, we create magic together at the office. You also get two ‘give-me-a-break’ days per year for extra time off, and our flexible working hours help you balance your time. We also support you through every stage of life with our benefits package.
 



  





*We invite you to a career in motion.* 




  





 Your development is at the center of our culture. We dedicate at least 40 hours per year for you to deepen your expertise, explore new areas, and develop in your role. Through Telenor Academy and other learning initiatives, you’ll have the tools and freedom to advance your career. When you want to broaden your horizons, we are present throughout the Nordics.
 



  





**Apply today!** 




 Will you take the next step in your career with us? We look forward to your application!
 



  





 In this recruitment, Telenor collaborates with Experis IT, which has extensive experience in recruiting IT specialists and managers. If you have any questions or need more information, please contact Recruitment Consultants Anki Snis anki.snis@se.experis.com, +46 70-3775969 and Carina Eyoma at carina.eyoma@se.experis.com, +46 73-086 22 75.
 



  





 Selection is ongoing, so apply as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receive your application!
 



  





**Good to know** 




 As part of Telenor’s policy, we conduct background checks on final candidates for all recruitments.

title: Back End Developer
description:
*The world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service is looking for a Senior Back End Developer to join the band in a consultant assignment. The client has transformed music listening forever when launched in 2008.* 




  





***Period:***
*2025-07-14 to 2026-01-13 (full-time), with a possibility of extension.* 




  





**About the role** 




 We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join a cross functional team of data scientists, mobile, web and backend engineers to create custom tailored user flows through personalization. The squad ensures customers realize value throughout their client journey. They deliver personalized experiences that help customers discover new and exciting features and get the most out of their subscription.
 



  





 As a backend engineer you will have the opportunity to have a significant impact on the company's growth and revenue by reaching new users, markets and audiences. The team achieve this by truly understanding the needs of users, and by innovating and experimenting to solve real problems for them, building solutions across the entire client infrastructure to support our client's goal.
 



  





**What you'll do** 



* Design, develop and deploy resilient and scalable Java services supporting web and mobile applications
* Work with other engineers on the team to adopt best practices and improve the quality of our solutions
* Collaborate with Data Scientists, Product Managers and Product Designers to build new product features
* Adopt a data first mindset, producing high quality data about user interactions and leveraging experimentation to measure the impact of new features
* Develop individually to continue to grow your impact and help mentor peer.



  





**Who you are** 



* You have 5+ years of working experience as a Backend Engineer working with Java.
* Additional tools and technologies such as gRPC, GCP, BigQuery and Bigtable are a plus.
* You have experience in implementing, and scaling cloud-native software components on providers such as GCP, AWS, etc.
* You have experience working directly with stakeholders to understand, document and develop APIs and systems to meet their requirements.
* You have written distributed, high-volume services and know how to deploy and keep them running in production.
* You have a growth mindset, are curious and not afraid to be experimental. You share your ideas and continuously improve yourself and the team around you.
* Experience with Conversion or User Retention is a plus.



  





**We are Market Partner** 




*Market Partner is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome to our community regardless of who you are, no matter where you come from, or what you look like. We apply ongoing selection and may fill the position as soon as we find the right candidate.*

title: Java Developer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Insurance
description:
Avigna is hiring for a
 **"Java Developer."** 




 Our IT Delivery Center aims to build strong and sustainable solutions for customers across Europe. We are looking for a
 **Java Developer** 
 to join the team to build, support, and drive customer innovations, bringing efficiency to the processes through efficient cost and schedule management. If you want to grow and build the foundation on the IT platform working across multiple customers, look no further.
 



 In alignment with Avigna’s values, we are committed to providing an inclusive work environment for all employees to positively impact our culture every day
 



**Location: Stockholm** 




**Experience: 10 years** 




 Project Duration: 1 yr
 



**Must-Haves:** 



* 10+ years of Java development, with experience in complex finance or insurance systems.
* Strong in microservices, APIs, CI/CD, test automation, and version control.
* Agile team player (Scrum/SAFe) with the ability to align business and tech needs.
* Familiarity with Spring Boot, Kafka, REST, OpenAPI, Docker, and Kubernetes is a plus.



**What we offer:** 



* Access to a strong developer community within the company to learn and grow.
* Competitive salary, good work-life balance, along with health and life insurance.



 If interested, kindly share your CV to sheela.chintalapati@avigna.se

title: Full Stack Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
**Hello,** 




  





**I hope you are doing good.** 




  





**Position – FullStack Engineer** 




**Location – Stockholm, Sweden (Onsite)** 




**Language - English** 




**Experience - 8+ Years** 




**Duration - 6 months Contract, It's extendable** 




  





**Job Description** 




 As a Fullstack Agile Engineer you will be part of a dedicated DevOps Team Your main responsibilities are:• To develop and design robust and sustainable IT Solutions• To act as a bridge between business and technical knowledge• Be able to translate user stories into detailed solutions and integration design, following Complany architecture guidelines.• Collaborate with software developer peers, UX-designers, business experts and Product Owner• To team up with IT Solution Architects and Solution Designers to collaborate on technical aspects by following Company IT framework and guidelines• To refine and review business requirements to ensure the most effective use of infrastructure and IT systems • Your software development is according to best practice principles• Contribute to the Agile team norms and coding standards, software design best practices, and architecture strategy• Use, ensure and implement secure software development• Be an ambassador for application solution best practices and application security• Share your software development and solution design best practices with your peers within ITYour qualifications as a Senior Fullstack Agile Engineer: •
 **More than 5 years’ experience as a developer• The tech stack: Angular 15+, html, css, typescript, javaScript .net core, Microsoft Azure Cloud solutions•** 
 Good knowledge Optimizely (EpiServer CMS) development• MS DevOps, MS Visual studio, Git & Gitflow• DAST och SAST tools • Automatic unit and integration testing • A deep interest in driving value-creating software development and innovation• 3 years of experience in Agile frameworks and agile software development• Experience of Solution Design and IT architecture within the web area and cloud solution area is a plus• API design and Management• University degree in Information Technology, Engineering or other relevant education

title: STEP Developer
description:
**Shape the Future of Master Data at Nobia** 




 We are looking for an
 **MDM STEP Developer** 
 who is passionate about building structured, high-quality data solutions that empower better customer experiences and smarter business decisions. At Nobia, Europe's leading kitchen specialist, we’re on an exciting transformation journey—and data is at the heart of it.
 



  





 This role plays a key part in supporting and developing our Master Data Management (MDM) solutions, focusing on
 **STEP** 
 as our core MDM platform. You will contribute to harmonized business processes and a global SAP template that supports our "One Company" agenda—enabling smarter operations across Europe.
 



  





**As an MDM STEP Developer, you will:** 



* Support the build and roll out of STEP as Nobia’s primary MDM system
* Design solutions aligned with our application development road map to ensure security, scalability, and fit-for-purpose systems
* Develop STEP configurations and enhancements based on business requirements using core application components and clean, concise code
* Collaborate with the Lead Architect to shape the future of our product data platform, including PIM and DAM
* Design and maintain product data interfaces, data models, data upload processes, and maintenance workflows
* Understand and document data flows from source to consumer systems
* Ensure data cleaning, validation, and integrity to maintain high-quality data
* Work closely with analytics and business stakeholders to identify needs and prioritize development
* Be an advocate for strong data foundations within the organization



  





**We’re looking for someone who:** 



* Brings strong technical skills in Java or JavaScript, XML, and JSON
* Understands data integration with downstream systems and is detail-oriented about information design
* Has experience with data profiling, data mapping, and quality rules development in STEP
* Is fluent in English



  





**Why Nobia?** 




 At Nobia, we don’t just build kitchens—we build sustainable solutions that improve lives. You’ll be part of a purpose-driven company where people matter, ideas grow, and potential is realized.
 



 We offer:
 


* A collaborative and forward-thinking environment
* Opportunities for learning and development



 We hire for attitude and train for skills. If you're ready to be part of something meaningful, we’d love to hear from you.
 



  





**Apply Now** 




 Ready to join a company that’s shaping the future of kitchen living through data? Apply today and become part of Nobia’s data-driven journey.
 **Last day to apply is July 6, 2025.**

title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description:
🚀 Senior Front-End Developer (React) | Remote | US Product
 



 We are looking for an experienced Front-End Developer (React) to join an international team and help us grow a scalable platform — an online store builder that already powers thousands of e-commerce projects worldwide.
 



 The project is US-based with a stable business model and a large global user base. We work fast, flexibly, and with a strong focus on quality.
 



  





 What you’ll be doing:
 


* Developing new features using React and Redux
* Participating in UI architecture design
* Creating reusable components and UI libraries
* Translating design concepts into clean, maintainable code



  





 What we expect from you:
 


* 7+ years of web development experience
* Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript
* Deep understanding of React, Redux, and modern UI development principles
* Experience with responsive and cross-browser layouts
* Understanding of REST API and attention to UX details



  





 What we offer:
 


* Stable US product with a strong product focus
* Fully remote work
* Flexible schedule
* Minimal bureaucracy, maximum ownership

 It's important to us that you are in the European time zone.
 



  





 Want to work on a product used by thousands of people every day? Send me a message or apply below

title: App utvecklare
description:
**Om Vimla!** 




 Är du en nyfiken apputvecklare som vill jobba i en teknikdriven miljö och göra skillnad för hundratusentals aktiva användare? Vimla är mobiloperatören, som genom att vara en fristående del av Telenor, kombinerar kraften från en stor organisation med friheten och flexibiliteten i ett litet team. Vi står för att ta kundfokus, enkelhet och schyssthet till en ny nivå på mobilmarknaden och i vårt team. Vi vill att det ska vara enkelt och roligt att vara kund så väl som medarbetare hos oss!
 



  





 Nu har du chansen att joina teamet i rollen som apputvecklare, ta chansen och sök!
 



  





**Vad du kommer att göra** 




 I rollen som apputvecklare på Vimla kommer du in i en scale-up miljö där du tillsammans med ditt team arbetar i syfte att utveckla och underhålla Vimlas tekniska miljö. Ni står i centrum för att bygga de tekniska förutsättningarna för en helt digital mobiloperatör. Du arbetar tillsammans med ett tight team av utvecklare med passion för teknik och bra stämning. Teamet består av såväl juniora som mer seniora kollegor, vilket medför en kultur av lärande och kunskapsdelning.
 



 Inom ramen för rollen kommer du få ta ett helhetsansvar för våra mobilappar för Android och iOS genom att både utforma och utveckla nya funktioner samt underhålla och uppdatera plattformarna. Du får stor frihet och ansvar att utforma det mest använda sättet för våra användare att interagera med Vimla!
 



 Hos oss får du möjlighet att utmanas, utveckla din kompetens och arbeta med fantastiska och kompetenta kollegor. Om du gillar att ha en möjlighet att påverka vad du jobbar med, en bredd i dina arbetsuppgifter och jobba i ett tight DevOps-team - det här är platsen för dig!
 



  





**Vi söker dig som** 




 Vi ser att du har minst tre års tidigare erfarenheter inom utveckling av appar för Android och iOS samt gärna bredare erfarenheter från frontend-utveckling. Du har fokus på leverans och säkerställer alltid god kvalitet i slutresultatet och tror att du tidigare har erfarenhet från att designa, bygga och underhålla distribuerade system i en molnbaserad miljö (tex AWS). Vi förutsätter att du kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska.
 



  





 Tech-stack du jobbar med:
 


* App & Frontend: React, TypeScript, Redux, Jest, Playwright, Expo Update, Firebase, Android Studio, Xcode
* Infrastruktur: CI/CD med GitHub Actions
* Arbetssätt: Agilt, DevOps, testdriven utveckling (TDD)



  





**Varför du vill jobba på Vimla** 




 Vimla är på en spännande tillväxtresa och möjligheterna att växa och utvecklas tillsammans med oss är enorma. Vi är ett roligt, tight team på runt 40 personer i en egen organisation som har stor frihet. Samtidigt är Vimla en del av Telenor Sverige och använder tryggheten som finns i ett stort bolag.
 



  





**Bra att veta** 




 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Vimla/Telenor med Experis IT, som har lång erfarenhet av att rekrytera IT-specialister och chefer.
 







 Om du har frågor eller vill ha mer information är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulterna Anki Snis på
 **anki.snis@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 70-377 59 69, och Carina Eyoma på
 **carina.eyoma@se.experis.com** 
 , +46 73-086 22 75.
 



  





 Urval sker löpande, så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att ta del av din ansökan!
 



  





 I enlighet med Telenors policy genomför vi en bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidater i alla rekryteringar.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
At Bending Spoons, we’re striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.
   

  

 To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform—which comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor’s attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.
   

  

 For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That’s our promise to such a candidate.
   

  

**A few examples of your responsibilities** 
* **Master your toolkit.** 
 By working across diverse tech stacks, you’ll refine your ability to choose the right tools for every challenge. From monolithic to microservices architectures, gRPC to REST APIs, Kubernetes to Docker, Python to Rust—you’ll show that true expertise isn’t about using the trendiest technologies, but about understanding their purpose to unleash their full potential.
* **Build stuff that matters.** 
 Regardless of your seniority, you’ll enjoy plenty of autonomy and take full ownership of your work, from ideation to execution. You’ll have the unique opportunity to build software from the ground up and witness firsthand how your code evolves into a product used at scale.
* **Simplify relentlessly.** 
 Is every component essential? Do we need this process? As a Bending Spoons engineer, your mission is to turn complexity into simplicity. Whether optimizing CI/CD pipelines, writing maintainable code, or crafting minimalist architectures, your drive to simplify will power scalable, future-proof solutions.


**What we look for** 
* **Reasoning ability.** 
 Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
* **Drive.** 
 You’re extremely ambitious in everything you do—and your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high—and rising—bar.
* **Team spirit.** 
 You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You’re reliable, honest, and transparent.
* **Proficiency in English.** 
 You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.
* **You can work at least 20 hours per week.** 
 A full-time commitment is preferred, but we’ll consider applicants who can commit to at least 20 hours per week.


**What we offer** 
* **Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams.** 
 You’ll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
* **An exceptional opportunity for growth.** 
 We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential—then, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you’ve got what it takes, you’ll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
* **Competitive pay and access to equity in the company.** 
 Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of £66,779 in the UK and €63,965 elsewhere. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between £110,389 and £149,636 in the UK, and €105,737 and €143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
* **All. These. Benefits.** 
 Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


**Commitment & contract**
 Internship. Full-time or part-time.
   

  

**Location**
 Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.
   

  

**Before you apply**
 Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We're extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don't hesitate to apply.
   

  

**The selection process**
 If you pass our screening, we’ll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you’re successful with those, we’ll invite you to a series of interviews.
   

  

 Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested through this form.
   

  

 Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn’t a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

title: Experienced Java Developer
description:
My clients on the hunt for a

 with cutting-edge Java skills and serious fintech pedigree to join a fast-paced, high-impact project.
 



  





 You’ll be jumping in at the start of the mission-critical platform that is set out to handle
 **thousands of transactions per day** 
 . This is a

 environment where your expertise will drive real-time innovation.

 **Java 21**
